mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, P.pno, P.pregdate, P.pname, P.pdetail, P.uno, U.uname, L.ltitle, L.lbgcolor FROM Project P LEFT JOIN Label L ON P.lno = L.lno LEFT JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno LEFT JOIN ProjectMemberStat S ON S.pno = P.pno WHERE S.stat=#{stat} AND S.uno=#{uno} ORDER BY P.pno ASC
select COUNT(pno) FROM ProjectMemberStat where uno=#{uno} and stat='000'

SELECT DISTINCT M.mno, M.mtitle, M.mstatement FROM Project P Join Milestones M on M.pno = P.pno join ProjectMemberStat S on M.pno = S.pno WHERE P.uno=#{uno} OR S.uno=#{uno} ORDER BY M.mregdate DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT P.pname, S.regDate, U.uname FROM ProjectMemberStat S JOIN Project P ON S.pno = P.pno JOIN User U ON P.uno = U.uno WHERE S.uno=#{uno} AND stat=000 ORDER BY S.regDate DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT COUNT(ino) FROM Issues WHERE mno=#{mno} and istatement=001
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Milestones WHERE pno=#{pno} AND mstatement=001
